subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The backup goalie Chad Johnson made 37 saves to lead the Islanders past the Hurricanes. The Devils’ Scott Gomez and Jacob Josefson scored in a shootout against the Sabres.
snippet: The backup goalie Chad Johnson made 37 saves to lead the Islanders past the Hurricanes. The Devils’ Scott Gomez and Jacob Josefson scored in a shootout against the Sabres.
